Petitions must comply with the Commission's procedure...
redundant_sections.text2_snippet: Any interested person may petition the Commission to issue, amend, or revoke a rule or regulation by submitting a written request to the Secretary, Consumer Product Safety Commission, 4330 East West Highway, Bethesda, Maryland 20814. The petition procedure is...

redundant_sections.text1_snippet: For purposes of this part, the term 'hazardous substance' means any substance or mixture of substances which is toxic, corrosive, an irritant, a strong sensitizer, flammable or combustible, or generates pressure through decomposition, heat, or other means...
redundant_sections.text2_snippet: The term 'hazardous substance' as used in this part means any substance or mixture of substances which is toxic, corrosive, an irritant, a strong sensitizer, flammable or combustible, or generates pressure through decomposition, heat, or other means...

overlapping_chunks.text: This standard establishes performance requirements for consumer products to reduce the risk of injury to children. The requirements apply to products manufactured, imported, distributed, or sold in commerce in the United States...
All testing shall be conducted in accordance with the procedures specified in this part. The manufacturer must ensure that products comply with all applicable requirements before distribution...

parity_sections.text1_snippet: Each manufacturer must certify that its products comply with all applicable consumer product safety rules. The certification must be based on testing of the product or a reasonable testing program...
parity_sections.text2_snippet: Manufacturers are required to ensure their products meet all applicable safety standards. This obligation includes conducting appropriate testing and maintaining records of compliance...
